item.title: What kind of cars do Finns drive?
item.description: Cars in Finland The Finnish Transport and Communications Agency Traficom shares some open datasets on their website. Here we are going to be looking at open data for vehicles. Maybe we can learn something about the cars people drive in Finland? Start with the mandatory imports I will be using Pandas for processing the data and Seaborn-Matplotlib combo for any visualizations. import pandas as pd import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns sns.
